titles: An elegy on the truly honoured and greatly beloved Sir VVilliam Jones, who deceased May the 2d. 1682.
notes: Verse: "WHen the great Hales, who was both ..."
Imperfect: stained, affecting title and imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Jones, William, --  Sir, 1631-1682 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
